board.name: CY8CKIT-062-WIFI-BT
board.summary: The PSoC 6 WiFi-BT Pioneer Kit is a low-cost hardware platform that enables design and debug of the PSoC 62 MCU (CY8C6247BZI-D54) and the Murata LBEE5KL1DX Module (CYW4343W WiFi + Bluetooth Combo Chip).
board.prov_capabilities: psoc6 cyw43xxx arduino led switch wifi bt usb_device usb_host capsense qspi memory
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • BLE v5.0
  • Serial memory interface
  • PDM-PCM digital microphone interface
  • Industry-leading CapSense
  • Full-speed USB
  • IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n WLAN

Kit Contents:
  • CY8CKIT-062-WIFI-BT evaluation board
  • TFT display shield with a 2.4" TFT display, light sensor, 6-axis motion sensor, and digital microphone
  • USB cable
